headline: Nu Holdings (NYSE:NU) Valuation in Focus Following U.S. Bank Charter Bid and Amazon Brazil Partnership
summary: Nu Holdings (NYSE:NU) is making headlines after applying for a U.S. national bank charter and setting its sights on the American market for the first time. At the same time, a new partnership with Amazon will see NuPay added as a payment option on Amazon Brazil. See our latest analysis for Nu Holdings. Nu Holdings is riding a wave of big-picture momentum, with its share price surging 49.3% year-to-date and recently hitting a record high. These are clear signs that investors are excited by its...

headline: What are Europe’s sovereign cloud/AI ambitions
summary: Investing.com -- Europe’s push for data sovereignty and artificial intelligence (AI) self-reliance is accelerating as governments and corporations seek to reduce dependence on U.S. cloud providers.
